text: Edgars Rinkēvičs (born 21 September 1973) is a Latvian public official and politician who is the President of Latvia since 8 July 2023. He has been the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Latvia from 2011 to 2023. He is the first openly gay head of state in a European Union country. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:LGBT politicians Category:Gay men Category:Latvian politicians
title: Edgars Rinkēvičs
